favourite.article: Lord continue to gain and occupy me.
This song really touched me.
Thank You God for Your incomparable love.
Amen to the God truly loved us all... Praise the Lord.
I love You Lord...thank You and we praise You Lord for Your divine love. Your heart will satisfy us, to build Your church and to have Your glorious bride. Halellujah, praise the Lord...
I am very interested in this hymn. The first I heard this hymn I think God Jesus has touched my heart.

O Lord Jesus, Thank You for everything, Thank You for Your glorious divine love that You have given to us and thank you for making us Your bride (church) and setting us free from our sins, Every time I hear this song I'm always reminded that our Lord Jesus made everything for all of us. Thank You Lord Jesus, Amen.
This is it! this is what God longs for. Lord consume our vision with such a true knowing of You and Your person. In our spirit!
I love this song, and I give it all to Him because He is our Savior all the time. We love You Lord.
Praise the living Jesus, bless the creators of this amzing website, now one can have their very own choir practice before Sunday. Awesome this is the best thing since sliced bread. :)
Amen, praise the Lord for the glorious divine love. We're so thankful that we're blessed to have Him. Oh Lord, Amen, Hallelujah.
This song is SO lovely. I lost a son this summer, and this hymn has come to mean so, SO much to me. Whoever the songwriter is, beautiful!
I like this very much. This is one of my favorite hymns. The more I listen to this I feel that the Lord is with me always.

Praise the Lord. Through this hymn I am reminded of the Lord's love to me and His heart desire to build up the church for His Bride. This is His eternal plan. May the Lord be more gracious to me that I will remain in this vision and be one with His eternal plan. Come suffering or joy, whatever betide, I will always love You my Lord Jesus. Amen.

Oh Lord Jesus! I love You. Oh Lord! I want to give my whole being to You. I want to offer my uttermost being that nothing else could occupy except YOU alone. This was my favorite song which really touches my heart. I really felt happy when listening to this song. It reminds me of my love towards the Lord and His great and eternal love for me. Lord Jesus, I love You!!!
Amen, amen, amen! This song is a complete revelation of God's eternal economy!

I love hearing this song. It makes my heart flow without water helping me to. Oh Lord Jesus Christ! My God and my Father! How great is Your plan for me to become Your bride. You've died for Your church, Your loved one. Amen. Oh Lord, You made Your thing, help me to do mine to please You. Oh Lord. Praise the Lord! Oh Lord!! Amen!!! Hallelujah!!!! Praise the Lord!!!!! Jesus!!!!!! Triune GOD!!!!!!!
Praise the Lord! I like this song because it really touches me. It is always reminding me how God really loves me/us. He gave us His heart, life and soul. I really really love the Lord!!
This song touches the inner part of me. Every time I hear this song, I can feel the love of the Lord. I can live in the presence of our Lord Jesus. Lord Jesus, I love You. Amen!

article.author: Angel Borongan Church In Ozamiz City

favourite.article: Amen. Oh I really love this song. If you sing this you are deeply touched. The message of the song really inspires me to continue my studies. As we the partakers of today we need to consecrate our lives to the Lord and have constant fellowship with Him. Thus as we love Him so we need to consecrate ourselves to Him. Hallelujah for the Body.

Praise the Lord! Lord, we thank Thee for the salvation that You brought to us. This song will always remind us that God's plan was to be one with us, and with that plan God became a man, to be crucified and be ressurected as a life-giving Spirit. Hallelujah! What wondrous revelation. God loves us that He gives us the chance to be one with Him, to be His church, His glorious Bride, mutual abode in eternity!

Praise the Lord for the unlimited love of God that saves us from our pitiful and miserable situation! Every time I hear this song, it reminds me to renew my first and best love toward Him! LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU! I LOVE YOU LORD FOR MAKING ME PART OF YOUR ECONOMY! LORD KEEP ME AND PRESERVE ME BY YOUR LOVE! THAT I MAY BECOME PART OF YOUR CORPORATE BRIDE THAT SATISFIES YOUR HEART! AMEN!

I love You，Lord！till You came into my life, I began to know what the love really is. Love is Your precious person, love is You became man, died on cross and resurrected from death to enter into my spirit as my possession. Love is You become me and I become You in life and nature to be the mutual abode. How high the love is! How deep the love is! Higher than the sky, deeper than the sea. Jesus，I love You! Amen.
I really like this hymn. It makes me realize how glorious and divine the love of God is. His love has no boundary and limitation. Amen.

"All that God has given us, even what He has wrought into us and through us, must eventually be offered back to Him that we may live a life of faith, not holding on to anything, even to the things given by God BUT relying on Him." [ICBM] Amen!!!
I like it. O the glorious Love: so boundless and immeasurable. Hallelujah!

Oh Lord Jesus,Your love is really glorious. It really touches us. You really longed for a bride. Oh Lord Jesus we're deeply in love with You, Lord. We'll do anything for that divine love. Before we turned our backs to You, Lord. But Lord since we already received You, we SEEK Your face. We want to enjoy You, Lord. Amen.

That we could be called into this kind of glorious divine Love truly leaves me in awe. What beautiful words to describe the romance between God and man. Lord We just are here loving You on the earth, Loving Your purpose and being controlled by this clear controlling vision of Your eternal Economy. Lord we give our entire being for what is on Your Precious Heart. Thank You for including all the dear saints here in Your plan... such great great utter mercy. Lord... I love You too:)
Praise the Lord for the supply in the Body, everything for us, unto the building up of the Body in Love.
O How Glorious His Divine Love Is Higher than the sky deeper than the sea so fervid and so deep, so gentle and so true. hallelujah

Wondrous love! Boundless grace! It is by such a glorious divine love and grace that we can be one with the Lord forever! Lord, make me fall more and more in love with You moment by moment...until I could give You my heart, my life, my soul and even my entire being. Lord, do make me pure and absolute for the building up of Your church, Your glorious Bride.

amen! O glorious divine, how can I fathom.You're higher than the sky and deeper than the sea.Nothing can compare Your love to me.So fervid and so deep. Lord thank you so much for loving us. Cause me also to love You in return for the rest of my life. ameeeen!

Praise the Lord, for His greatest gift for us.He love us unconditionally, unlimited.How lucky & precious we are that He choose us before the foundation of the World and be part of His body. Amen halleluyah..Thank you Lord Jesus..I love you Lord..
i lyk this song very much,coz everytime i sang this,my heart draws closer to the Lord..I was captivated by His divine love............amen
this song impressed me very much.because we can find how God love us.that's why have to love Him for the rest of our life. Amen
Praise the Lord Brothers & Sister this song me very much and give me strength

let the word of Christ dwell in us richly in all wisdom, teachind, and admonishing one another with psalms, hymns and spiritual songs singing with grace in your hearts to God. Let's all become a prophet who is constituted with the truth, speaking the word of God, speaking forth God. amen let's PSRP this song.
how i missed this song..oh Lord Jesus how i missed u..Lord i Love You!Lord thank you that u Love me unconditionally!
OH HOW GLORIOUS YOU ARE LORD!!!i want to become your bride to be...thank you for loving us UNCONDITIONALLY.....i want to love you for the rest of my life.... LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU SO MUCH!!!amen
The Lord saved us to become His precious Bride, that we may be all built up together in the marvelous Body of Christ in all the earth.
I love the Lord!!!!!!!

Hi, all the sisters and brothers. We should group together online one day, and share what u enjoy from the Lord. and preach the gospel online. (Don't forget we can preach AT ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME) gospel isn't limited by localities. we should preach the kindom of God all the time. That's why God chose us, and want us to be His expressions. We are all prophets, cuz we receive the gift from the Lord. we are chosen to speak the words of God, we are all prophets!!!
I believe in Jesus Christ.
